thread.title: Mark Cuban to O’Reilly: I Don’t Think Trump Has ‘Been Able to Show Any Leadership’ in WH
thread.title_full: Mark Cuban to O’Reilly: I Don’t Think Trump Has ‘Been Able to Show Any Leadership’ in WH

author: Josh Feldman
title: Mark Cuban to O’Reilly: I Don’t Think Trump Has ‘Been Able to Show Any Leadership’ in WH
text:
Feds Arrest First ‘Dreamer’ Given Work Permit Under Obama video Mark Cuban to O’Reilly: I Don’t Think Trump Has ‘Been Able to Show Any Leadership’ in WH by Josh Feldman | 8:48   
Mark Cuban appeared with Bill O’Reilly tonight and said he’s not very impressed with how President Trump has done these past few weeks: 
“I don’t think he’s been able to show any leadership. I don’t think he’s taken responsibility for the White House, and I don’t think he’s shown them any direction.” 
He echoed what O’Reilly said minutes ago about the communications issues and message inconsistencies coming from the White House. 
Trump recently took a shot at Cuban on Twitter and said he’s “not smart enough to run for president,” and Cuban tweeted right back at him . 
O’Reilly engaged with Cuban on what his policy issues with Trump are, and the two of them got into a lively back-and-forth about American jobs and health care. 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
